summary: This document is an Amendment Agreement between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Financial, LLC, amending certain terms of a prior ISDA Master Agreement. It outlines the requirements for document delivery, financial limits, and representations made by both parties, and specifies that the agreement will be governed by New York law.

persons.name: Eduardo Waite
persons.context: Eduardo Waite is identified as a Vice President who signed the Amendment Agreement on behalf of Deutsche Bank AG.

persons.name: Marry It
persons.context: Marry It is mentioned in the context of executing the Agreement but lacks a clear role description.

keyFacts: The Amendment Agreement is dated October 12, 2015.
It amends an ISDA Master Agreement dated October 28, 2013.
The document outlines requirements for delivering various IRS forms.
It specifies financial limits for certain agreements, including an Aggregate Ceiling Limit of USD 100,000,000.
The Amendment will be governed by the laws of the State of New York.
